summary: Simple mod that allows you to drop your gold one piece at a time to the ground.
descriptionHtml:
Saw this: [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/535918-drop-able-gold-coins/page__view__findpost__p__4364077]Drop-able gold coins[/url] in the Mod Requests section and thought why not...

Drops one gold piece per press of a key.
New function constantly drops pieces of gold as you hold a key.

Requires SKSE [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]http://skse.silverlock.org/[/url]

Install with NMM or manually to your Skyrim/data directory
Uninstall with NMM or remove from your Skyrim/data directory

Default key to press is the 0 key on the main keyboard (not number pad). I didn't script any way to change it so you'll have to change it the "old fashioned way" with the Creation Kit. See [url=http://www.creationkit.com/Input_Script]this page[/url] on the Creation Kit wiki for help in choosing which # to assign for a specific key,
Default key for the new function is the 9 key on the main keyboard (not number pad)

Feel free to adapt this & use it in anything you want. I spent more time waiting for the CK to load up than I did in making it. :P
author: IsharaMeradin

files.name: Drop That Gold
files.changelogHtml:
Initial release
Has ability to drop one gold piece at the press of the 0 key on the main keyboard (not numpad)

files.name: Drop That Gold
files.changelogHtml: Added constant gold drop while holding the 9 key on the keyboard (not numpad)
